refsect1.programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in -odac -iadc ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o divz.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
; Initialize the global variables. sr = 44100 kr = 4410 ksmps = 10 nchnls = 1
; Instrument #1. instr 1 ; Define the numbers to be divided. ka init 200 ; Linearly change the value of kb from 200 to 0. kb line 0, p3, 200 ; If a "divide by zero" error occurs, substitute -1. ksubst init -1
; Safely divide the numbers. kresults divz ka, kb, ksubst
; Print out the results. printks "%f / %f = %f\\n", 0.1, ka, kb, kresults endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
; Play Instrument #1 for one second. i 1 0 1 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
